item.title: Best Music 2013
item.description: This year, I listened many new relases. I selected best 10 musics from which I listened this year. Ryouji Ikeda “Supercodex” Oneothrix Point Never “R Plus Seven” Holden “the Inheritors” Forest Sword “Engravings” Washed Out “Paracosm” Shigeto “No Better Time Than Now” ATOM ™ “HD” ((さらうんど)) “New Age” Majical Cloudz “Impersonator” Darkstar “News From Nowhere” Reference Best Music 2012

item.title: Best Music 2012
item.description: I met many nice musics in this year, I selected my best in this year. Flying Lotus “Until the Quiet Comes” Chilly Gonzales “Solo Piano II” Lapalax “When you’re gone” Einar Stray “Chiaroscuro” Squarepusher “Ufabulum” Bibio “Ambivalence Avenue” Tropics “Parodia Flare” TOKiMONSTA “Creature Dreams” Brian Eno “Lux” 宮内優里 “ワーキングホリデー”
